snippet: Eric Christiansen’s documentary explores the struggles of veterans who returned home from World War II and succeeding conflicts, from the wars in Korea and Vietnam to those in Iraq and Afghanistan.
abstract: Anita Gates reviews Eric Christiansen documentary film Searching for Home: Coming Back From War.
lead_paragraph: Eric Christiansen’s documentary explores the struggles of veterans who returned home from World War II and succeeding conflicts, from the wars in Korea and Vietnam to those in Iraq and Afghanistan.

headline.main: ‘Searching for Home,’ a Cross-Generational Look at Military Veterans
headline.print_headline: ‘Searching for Home,’ a Cross-Generational Look at Military Veterans
